my table arrangement celebrating my friends birthday

output.sentences: This celebration got started early with happy meals cooked by me in my kitchen.
The plate and siverware place on a beautiful tablecloth set the mood for dinner.
I loved the meal and the yellow flowers in front of my place were pleasing to the eye,
Well this will be a birthday to remember with drink and homemade chocolate cake with just the right number of candles.
Thank goodness this eay is over and I can sit down by myself and think about how my guest liked my meals.
